name: ivendPay
description: The core of IvendPay's innovation lies in integrating cryptocurrency payments into various commercial and retail environments through multiple channels including bank terminals, e-commerce plugins, APIs, iOs\Android app, and vending machines. ivendPay's solution bridges the gap between traditional financial systems and the emerging digital economy, making it easier for consumers to use their cryptocurrencies for everyday purchases. This integration represents a significant step forward in the adoption and normalization of digital currencies
